DataSource.Query: WITH all_discount AS ( SELECT checkouts.value_date, customers.customer_name, SUM(checkout_detail_view.total) + SUM(checkout_detail_view.discount) AS sales_amount, SUM(checkout_detail_view.total) - checkouts.discount AS invoicing_amount FROM sales.sales LEFT JOIN inventory.checkouts ON checkouts.checkout_id = sales.checkout_id LEFT JOIN inventory.checkout_detail_view ON checkouts.checkout_id = checkout_detail_view.checkout_id LEFT JOIN inventory.customers ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id LEFT JOIN finance.transaction_master ON transaction_master.transaction_master_id = checkout_detail_view.transaction_master_id WHERE NOT checkouts.deleted AND transaction_master.office_id IN (SELECT get_office_ids FROM core.get_office_ids(@OfficeId::int)) AND transaction_master.verification_status_id > 0 AND checkouts.value_date BETWEEN @From::date AND @To::date AND COALESCE(@CustomerId, 0) = 0 OR sales.customer_id = @CustomerId GROUP BY checkouts.checkout_id, checkouts.discount, checkouts.value_date, customer_name ) SELECT value_date, customer_name, sales_amount, invoicing_amount, sales_amount - invoicing_amount AS difference_amount FROM all_discount ORDER BY all_discount.value_date;
